title: Happy Birthday, Chika-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Chika-chan, happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Thanks~! Wow, I feel so grown-up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hehe, actually, I got you a present, Chika-chan. It’s just a hair ornament, but…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>What!? Can I see it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Let me see~... Wow! Cute! It’s too cute!! ...Do you think it’ll look good on me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Of course it will! You’re really cute, Chika-chan! You know, I’d like to see you wear more pink or frilly or lacy things~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh, hearing you say that is making me feel a little embarrassed, ehehe… I’ll start wanting to do it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Please do, Chika-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ooh~… Now I want to!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
